content: मूलं [मूल्-क] {@--1@} A root (<ab>fig.</ab> also); तरुमूलानि गृहीभवति तेषां <ls>Ś. 7. 20</ls>; or शाखिनो धौतमूलाः <ls n="Ś.">1. 15</ls>; मूलं बंध् to take or strike root; बद्धमूलस्य मूलं हि महद्वैरतरोः स्त्रियः <ls>Śi. 2. 38.</ls> {@--2@} The root, lowest edge or extremity of anything; कस्याश्चिदासिद्रशना तदानीमंगुष्ठमूलार्पितसूत्रशेषा <ls>R. 7. 10</ls>; so प्राचीमूले <ls>Me. 89.</ls> {@--3@} The lower part or end, base, the end of anything by which it is joined to something else; बाह्वोर्मूलं <ls>Śi. 7. 32</ls>; so पादमूलं, कर्णमूलं, ऊरुमूलं &c. {@--4@} Beginning, commencement; आमूलाच्छ्रोतुमिच्छामि <ls>Ś. 1.</ls> {@--5@} Basis, foundation, source, origin, cause; सर्वे गार्हस्थ्यमूलकाः <ls>Mb.</ls>; रक्षोगृहे स्थितिर्मूलं <ls>U. 1. 6</ls>; इति केनाप्युक्तं तत्र मूलं मृग्यं ‘the source or authority should be found out’. {@--6@} The foot or bottom of anything; पर्वतमूलं, गिरिमूलं &c. {@--7@} The text, or original passage (as distinguished from the commentary or gloss). {@--8@} Vicinity, neighbourhood. {@--9@} Capital, principal, stock. {@--10@} A hereditary servant. {@--11@} A square root. {@--12@} A king's own territory; स गुप्तमूलप्रत्यंतं: <ls>R. 4. 26</ls>; <ls>Ms. 7. 184.</ls> {@--13@} A vender who is not the true owner; <ls>Ms. 8. 202</ls> (अस्वामिविक्रेता <ls>Kull.</ls>). {@--14@} The nineteenth lunar mansion containing 11 stars. {@--15@} A thicket, copse. {@--16@} The root of long pepper. {@--17@} A particular position of the fingers. {@--18@} A chief or capital city. {@--19@} An aboriginal inhabitant. {@--20@} A bower, an arbour (निकुंज). {@--21@} <ab>N.</ab> of several roots. पिप्यली, पुष्कर, शूरण &c. (In <ab>comp.</ab> मुल may be translated by ‘first, prime, original, chief, principal’; {%<ab>e. g.</ab>%} मूलकारणं ‘prime cause’ &c. &c.).
